original_title: Nörgel & Söhne en gros und en detail, Teil 2
overview: The Nörgel clan divides the labor and produce more hats than they need for themselves. As consequence, they look into an exchange of products at a market in Leipzig. However, Nörgel has to learn that animals might not be a good equivalent for a product trade, although they are needed by everyone. Part two of the animation trilogy Nörgel & Sons.
title: Nörgel & Söhne en gros und en detail, Teil 2
